name: R00:00M
description:
The game tells the story of one ROOM through the generation lens.

 Play as a resident of the one-room apartment both in 1951 and 2021. Squash the time passing through a door way . Move with . Interact with . And most importantly calm down your restless neighbours that love listening to music , by taking the mop and hitting the ceiling . Beware, when you are young and not height enough you have to use ledder to get to higher ground [W].

Credits
  • maksimov.maksimilian - Game design, Programming twitter
  • retr0grape - Art, Sound instagram

The game was fully made in terms of "The Indie Tales Jam", everything you see and hear was created in the time frame of 72h.
